scripts.dev:extension: bash -lc 'pnpm --filter @dbview/types watch & pnpm --filter @dbview/adapters watch & pnpm --filter @dbview/ui dev & pnpm --filter @dbview/vscode-extension watch'
scripts.dev:desktop: bash -lc 'pnpm --filter "./packages/**" watch & pnpm --filter "./apps/desktop" dev & pnpm --filter @dbview/desktop-ui dev'
scripts.build:extension: pnpm run build:types && pnpm run build:adapters && pnpm --filter @dbview/ui build && pnpm --filter @dbview/vscode-extension build
scripts.build:desktop: pnpm run build:types && pnpm run build:adapters && pnpm --filter @dbview/desktop-ui build && pnpm --filter @dbview/desktop build
scripts.rebuild:desktop: pnpm run clean:desktop && pnpm run build:desktop
